summary: A widower finds out the woman he fell in love with is his brother's girlfriend.
cast: Steve Carell|Juliette Binoche|Dane Cook|Alison Pill|Britt Robertson|Marlene Lawston|Dianne Wiest|John Mahoney|Norbert Leo Butz|Amy Ryan|Jessica Hecht|Frank Wood|Henry Priest Miller|Ella Miller|CJ Adams|Jessica Lussier|Seth D'Antuono|Margot Janson|Willa Cuthrell|Emily Blunt|Felipe Dieppa|Matthew Morrison|Bernie McInerney|Amy Landecker|Steve Mellor|Shana Carr|Nicole Morin|Charlotte Davies|Zoe Pauliks|Lucas Hedges|Sondre Lerche|Kato Ådland|Ole Ludvig Krüger|Morten Skage|Marci Occhino|Ellen Becker-Gray|Sean Collins|Julie Ann Dawson|Kevin DeCoste|Madison Donlan|John Franchi|Kevin Kate|Jaclyn Sabogal|Melanie Scalera|Tacuma Vanterpool
title: Como la vida misma
